caption.title: In vitro lifetime characterization of NADP-Snifit.

fn.p: The ‘donor only’ sample represents the purified sensor singly labeled with CP-TMR-SMX. The FRET samples corresponding to the closed and open sensor state were prepared respectively with 1 mM NADP+ and 2 mM sulfapyridine. The amplitude-weighted average lifetimes <τ> are represented as mean ± SD of triplicates. All samples were measured in buffer (50 mM HEPES, 150 mM NaCl, 0.5 mg/mL BSA, pH 7.5) at 37 °C. From the obtained lifetimes, the FRET efficiency (E) of the closed and open sensor was calculated.
